channel.title: ByteByteGo Newsletter
channel.description: Explain complex systems with simple terms, from the authors of the best-selling system design book series. Join over 1,000,000 friendly readers.

item.title: 【EP203: RabbitMQ vs Kafka vs Pulsar】EP203：RabbitMQ、Kafka、Pulsar
item.description: 【RabbitMQ, Kafka, and Pulsar all move messages, but they solve very different problems under the hood.】RabbitMQ、Kafka 和 Pulsar 都会移动消息，但它们在底层解决的问题却截然不同。

item.title: 【LAST CALL FOR ENROLLMENT: Become an AI Engineer - Cohort 4】最后报名：成为人工智能工程师 - 第 4 组
item.description: 【Enrollment for our upcoming Become an AI Engineer - Cohort 4 is closing soon, and classes officially begin on February 21.】我们即将推出的“成为人工智能工程师 - 第 4 组”的报名即将结束，课程将于 2 月 21 日正式开始。

item.title: 【Eventual Consistency: The Key Trade-Off Behind Modern Databases】最终一致性：现代数据库背后的关键权衡
item.description: 【In this article, we will look at what eventual consistency is, why it exists, how to control it, and how to handle the challenges it creates.】在本文中，我们将了解什么是最终一致性、它为何存在、如何控制它以及如何应对它带来的挑战。

item.title: 【The First 10-Year Evolution of Stripe’s Payments API】Stripe 支付 API 的第一个 10 年演变
item.description: 【In this article, we look at how Stripe’s payment APIs evolved over the years, the technical challenges they faced, and the engineering decisions that shaped modern payment processing.】在本文中，我们将了解 Stripe 的支付 API 多年来如何发展、它们面临的技术挑战以及塑造现代支付处理的工程决策。

item.title: 【How Cloudflare Eliminates Cold Starts for Serverless Workers】Cloudflare 如何消除无服务器工作人员的冷启动
item.description: 【Cut Code Review Time & Bugs in Half (Sponsored)】将代码审查时间和错误减少一半（赞助）

item.title: 【How OpenAI Scaled to 800 Million Users With Postgres】OpenAI 如何利用 Postgres 扩展到 8 亿用户
item.description: 【In this article, we will look at the challenges OpenAI faced while scaling Postgres and how the team handled the various scenarios.】在本文中，我们将探讨 OpenAI 在扩展 Postgres 时面临的挑战以及团队如何处理各种场景。

item.title: 【EP202: MCP vs RAG vs AI Agents】EP202：MCP vs RAG vs AI 代理
item.description: 【Everyone is talking about MCP, RAG, and AI Agents. Most people are still mixing them up.】每个人都在谈论 MCP、RAG 和 AI Agent。大多数人仍然把它们搞混了。

item.title: 【Must-Know Software Architecture Patterns】必须了解的软件架构模式
item.description: 【In this article, we will explore the essential architecture patterns that every software engineer should understand.】在本文中，我们将探讨每个软件工程师都应该理解的基本架构模式。

item.title: 【The Architecture Behind Atlas: OpenAI’s New ChatGPT-based Browser】Atlas 背后的架构：OpenAI 全新的基于 ChatGPT 的浏览器
item.description: 【In this article, we learn how the OpenAI Engineering Team built OWL and the technical challenges they faced around rendering and inter-process communication.】在本文中，我们了解 OpenAI 工程团队如何构建 OWL 以及他们在渲染和进程间通信方面面临的技术挑战。

item.title: 【How LinkedIn Built a Next-Gen Service Discovery for 1000s of Services】LinkedIn 如何为数千项服务构建下一代服务发现
item.description: 【In this article, we learn how LinkedIn built and rolled out Next-Gen Service Discovery, a scalable control plane supporting app containers in multiple programming languages.】在本文中，我们将了解 LinkedIn 如何构建和推出下一代服务发现，这是一个支持多种编程语言的应用程序容器的可扩展控制平面。
